ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: My point was they are as much of hybrids as bards because they also have reasonably strong melee skills/abilities, but not as strong as
ygData.messageBody:
My point was they are as much of hybrids as bards because they also have
reasonably strong melee skills/abilities, but not as strong as
rangers/paladins/shadowknights (neither do bards) and good casting
abilities. It really applies more to clerics and shamans as druids are more
limited by their poor armor.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Naeeldar [mailto:jackal@...]
Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 9:26 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>

Why are Cleric's Druids and Shamans hybrids?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <Dean_Kimes@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, September 30, 1999 2:59 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..


>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Not valid, cleric/druids/shamans are as much of hybrids as we are and can
>all bind. Verant doesn't acknowledge this but I think it is pretty clearly
>true.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: chlebek@... [mailto:chlebek@...]
>Sent: Thursday, September 30, 1999 12:16 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Hey this sounded interesting..

>From: chlebek@...

>
>
>> Its an interesting idea. And dont make assumptions for everyone else on
>the
>> list, they mayt not be sick of it.
>
>Let's take a vote...
>

>Me? I'm sick of it. We are hybrids. Verant has stated again and again

>Taelin
